title: Server Lag in rank games
body: Ok, so I was playing a rank game with Corki and all of a sudden all of my teammates and myself stopped moving and couldn't control our champions. I reconnected and found ourselves 5 kills behind and 3 towers down. We ended up /ff and lost. So will Riot give us our loss back and return our LP?

Hey Kajika91,

I saw your message, and I just wanted to touch on this extremely quickly.  Keep in mind that we do have an entire team dedicated to tracking when server issues are occurring. For instance, letâ€™s say they notice trends in dropped games 1 minute after they occur, and immediately enable Loss Prevented. Not only is this incredibly fast, but since around 10 games are created over each second, that means around 600 games were created in that time.  That means close to 6,000 players experienced an issue with the server crashing and will unfortunately not receive the loss prevented.  

I completely understand how shitty of an experience this can be, and this is why we very closely monitor the health of our game servers and try to press "the button" as soon as we can confirm such server issues.  I know nothing I say will restore these games, or the LP lost, but I hope I can at least shed some light on this issue.

Getting banned by the Leaver Buster System can be incredibly aggravating.  However, please keep in mind that the system only suspends people who demonstrate consistent behavior in leaving games.  We all experience technical issues (even I have lost soloqueue games due to random issues), and this is why we never ban people who left only a couple games.  It takes that consistent pattern of leaves or being AFK before the system issues a suspension.

While I know that your leaves are not intended, please keep in mind that you are still consistently ruining the gaming experience of up to 9 other players by not being in the game.  It is for this reason that the system temporarily suspends you.

To that end, when experiencing these kinds of issues, make sure that you try to contact us here in Player Support immediately!  We can work with you to get the necessary information to prevent this from occurring in the future.

Yeah we just had our entire team dc as well as 4 out of 5 of the enemy's team dc. Their nocturne ended up shoving mid and carrying the game once we all reconnected. It should at least be a loss prevented.

I was in a similar situation, I was in the middle of a ranked game, and we were winning by a landslide, then the server disconnected, and the game ended up being 4v5 in the enemy's favor, and therefore they won because we had hit mid/late-game and couldn't contest team fights. I lost 18 LP from that game, and am not impressed.
Yea we were winning but enemy team didnt D/C, so I hope Riot fixes this issue.
